name: Booster Kings
description:
A trading card game without a game. A card trading simulator, if you will.  Made in under 48 hours for the GMTK Gamejam 2018.

Don't take it seriously.

---------------------------------

Thanks for playing

Lead Designer - Callidus
2nd Lead Desiger and Sound - Alfredo
Chief Writer and play tester- Morky Lorky Diddle-Dong
Art 1 - Mario Minor
Art 2 - Herio
Art 3 - Alfredo's friend
